column5: We can do a quick trip....however....what do I need to do before crossing the border sat. morning? Where do I get a covid test? Also..my passport expired i just saw....can I even get across? Walgreens best spot to get a covid test and when? Sorry for all questions and thank you.
You need a small miracle,that's what you need.Best answer I can give you sry.
we had 2 people in our group that showed up at the border with expired passports. They ended up showing them their birth certificate and DL with the expired passports and were let through.

Probably need to get to reading. A lot of posts on here about the requirements. Some of the things you need to read up on:COVID vaccination proofNegative test within 72 hours of crossing that Canada will take. Most get the Walgreens version. Look at the Canada website for detailsComplete the arrive can app.Since your passport is expired drivers license and birth certificate. I think they also said bring the expired one.And all the other usual stuffGood luck

thanks....covid test on thursday morning. vaccination card in hand. Birth certificate, expired passport and DL ready. Arrivcan downloaded and ready to fill out. Just got to get fish gear together and pack. Will buy food and booze up there somewhere. Got plenty of mea to bring up.
Leave the live bait at home.
Leave the dead bait at home.
